channel.title: Visual Layouts Pro on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Layouts Pro on Damien Saunders

item.title: Teaser – Visual Layouts Pro (freetile)
item.description: Development has finished on my next plugin … Visual Layouts Pro (Freetile) plugin. This takes the Freetile jQuery plugin and mashes it up with Filtrify and Twitter Bootstrap to give you an awesome plugin for a responsive, visual layout … Key Features of Visual Layouts Pro Tags & Category based filters Show / Hide content Show Excerpt Works on posts, pages Includes Twitter Bootstrap with powerful options for CSS and web design Pagination
